title: Low priority games counter

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I recently was given a number of low priority queue games because of a mix of me being a scum bag and my internet dropping, i have no problem with being punished for breaking rules it makes sense but i cannot find the section that tells me the number of games i have left, it used to be right next to your ip/rp counter and now it is no where to be found. Does anyone know where i can find it?

TL;DR Where is the counter for low priority queue games?

replies.body:
It's likely you're in a queue dodge timer instead of a Leaverbuster. This is because Leaverbuster always shows a number of LPQ's left in the corner, and if it doesn't it's likely the message you're getting is not for Leaverbuster. If you wait out the timer and don't dodge, you shouldn't see another Low Priority Queue window again. 

Our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) covers the complete details. Let me know if you have any questions.
